classes

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hero, Villain

    public class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Character is a class for the Heroes And Villains application. It is the superclass of @Hero and @Villain.
    Author:
    Adam Conway, Flynn Doherty

        iconUrl - which is the link to the character's image icon on file

        defense - value of the character
        maxHealth - maximum health value of the character
